modName: Wild Huntress UNP Top Model BBP - UNP
summary: A light armor that can be crafted using the tanning rack. It is primarily made from leather and leather strips. Dragon bones are needed for the heels and armlets. It has similar stats with dragonscale armor and has an invisible head part for the full armor perk. It can also be improved using the workbench.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#FDEADA][size=4][i][font=Times New Roman]
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1399708924.png[/img]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1399516133.png[/img]
[b]Important information![/b]
This mod requires [b]HDT High Heels System[/b]. Get it [b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]here[/url][/b]!

[color=#FAC08F]Two new optional downloads added that do not require HDT but do not contain the awesome high heels :([/color]

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1399516133.png[/img]
[b]Info:[/b]
A light armor that can be crafted using the tanning rack. It is primarily made from leather and leather strips. Dragon bones are needed for the heels and armlets. It has similar stats with dragonscale armor and has an invisible head part for the full armor perk. It can also be improved using the workbench.

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1399516133.png[/img]

[youtube]V9DHyujsXj4[/youtube]

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1399516133.png[/img]
[b]Acquisition:[/b]
It can be crafted using a tanning rack and it is under the leather category.
If you want to skip the crafting part you can type help "wild huntress" in console for the codes.

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1399516133.png[/img]
[b]Versions:[/b]
1.0 Release of the mod
0.9 Test Version

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1399516133.png[/img]
[b]Optional Downloads:[/b]
-Top Model version that doesn't require HDT.
-UNP body version that doesn't require a special skeleton to work.
-UNP body version that doesn't require skeleton or HDT.
- German Translation

[b]Miscellaneous Downloads:[/b]
[b]Body Paint[/b] that needs to be installed manually by overwriting any of the existing body tattoos you might have installed. Only download it if you have some experience with modding and know exactly what you are doing.

[b]External Downloads:[/b]
A beautiful CBBE conversion!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59130/]Wild Huntress Armor - CBBE - HDT BodySlide TBBP by Mitosuke[/url]

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1399516133.png[/img]
[b][color=#C0504D]Required mods:[/color][/b]

For UNP:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36213/?]HDT HighHeels System by hydrogensayshdt[/url] for the high heel boots.

For Top Model
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS by xp32[/url] for the skeleton.
Or the one I'm using and highly recommend [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50301/?]Nakrulz Skeleton Pack[/url] (download under the optional files).

And
A UNP body based texture like the awesome [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature skin texture and body for UNP CBBE ADEC by Maevan2[/url]
or any of your liking.

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1399516133.png[/img]
[b]Known issues:[/b]
Without HDT High Heels System your game will crash. You can't use this mod without it!
When using the UNP Top Model version without a TBBP compatible skeleton the game will crash.
Try to avoid setting the weight slider to max when using top model, it might have undesirable results :)

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1399516133.png[/img]
[b]Installation:[/b]
a) Automatic by using the nexus mod manager
b) Manual by extracting the contents of the compressed file in the Skyrim/Data folder
[b]Important![/b] You can only have one of the two versions installed. If you want to switch between UNP and Top model then uninstall the one you are currently using.

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1399516133.png[/img]
[b]Un-installation:[/b]
a) Using the nexus mod manager
b) Manual by deleting Wild Huntress.esp from the Skyrim/Data folder
and by deleting the folder [b]Wild Huntress[/b] inside the Skyrim/Data/Textures/DX/ and Skyrim/Data/Meshes/DX/ folders.

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1399516133.png[/img]
[b]Mods used in the screenshots and video:[/b]
Face: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35474/?]The Ningheim Race by Seren4XX HelloSanta Urshi and co[/url]
Body: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41051/?]UNP Topmodel by es2[/url]
Textures: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841/?]Freckle Mania by tetrodoxin[/url]
Hair: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19623/?]Cazy hairs and demoness hairs conversion by zzjay by cazy and zzjay[/url]
Bow and Quiver: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27644/?]Immersive Weapons by Hothtrooper44 - Ironman5000 - Eckss[/url]
Necklace: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8361/?]Expanded Jewelry Crafting by lautasantenni[/url]
Daggers: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42280/?]Warrior Within Weapons by BloodFree[/url]

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1399516133.png[/img]
[b]Credits:[/b]
Original armor models by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20415/?]Brokefoots UNP Mashup Compilation by brokefoot[/url]
Top Model body conversion [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52015/?]Brokefoots UNP Mashup for UNP Top Model body with TBBP by Chitlin[/url]
Boots model [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43381/?]Bobs Boots for CBBE and UNP HDT REQUIRED by Beazalbob69[/url]
Thank you guys for the permissions and the amazing work you did in the first place!

And of course [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99[/url] for the original UNP body.

Many thanks also to:

TKHBMVP for the German translation! [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4827500/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Nexus Resources[/url], [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=298040664] Steam Resources[/url]

Bethesda who made all this possible.

[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53846-1-1399516133.png[/img]
